original_title: High Posts Committee approves multiple appointments
original_body_lines: The Committee on High Posts approved the appointments of two ministry secretaries and six chairpersons of state institutions recently (12), Assistant Secretary General of Parliament, Tikiri K Jayathilake said.
Accordingly, the Committee on High Posts has approved the appointment of Mrs. Yamuna Perera as the new secretary of the Ministry of Women, Child Affairs and Social Empowerment.
The Committee also approved the appointment of Mr. R.M.W.S Samaradivakara as the new Secretary of the Ministry of Water Supply and Estate Infrastructure Development.
The Committee on High Posts also approved the appointment of Mr. Sujeewa Rajapaksa as the Chairman of the People's Bank.

Furthermore, the appointments of Prof. S.R.D Rosa as the Chairman of the Sri Lanka Atomic Energy Board, Mr. Ratnasiri Kalupahana as the Chairman of the State Engineering Corporation of Sri Lanka, Eng. A. Galketiya as the Chairman of the Central Engineering Consultancy Bureau (CECB), Mrs. Stella Marapana as the Chairperson of the Public Performance Board and Mr. Jayantha Wijeratne as the Chairman of the National Aquaculture Development Authority have been approved by the Committee on High Posts.
